activities.name: grocery run
activities.desc: find a supermarket,make a list of what you wanna buy and divide it into two. Who gets first all their stuff, no self picking up

activities.name: Park walk
activities.desc: walk by the lake, park, talk about trees and their stories or clouds, time for thoughts

activities.name: Unexpected order
activities.desc: Go into a restaurant or caffe, don't order something,just ask waiters to random cook something for you as surprise

activities.name: Picnic in the forest
activities.desc: Picnic in the forest/lake, Eatings, fun games, love stories

activities.name: City run
activities.desc: city run with games, public place, try to answer partner's question with help of others. Introduce your partner to another person. Get to know each other better.

activities.name: Romantic dinner
activities.desc: Dinner, partner picks outfit, jewelry etc, everything is allowed, share each dish and talk as food experts to describe the feeling, afterwards go for a drink, all the time let your partner talk for you

activities.name: Go hiking
activities.desc: hiking, topics to talk about, goal of the day and relaxing evening activity, ideas for pictures

activities.name: Unexpected destination
activities.desc: call a random contact from your city and ask them where they would like to go if they had a free day and want to see something nice. Go there at the next day. Create a picture story together, silly picture movie

activities.name: Wellness at home
activities.desc: Wellness at home, massages, music, challenge for a dinner, different approach for all the common stuff. Strip movie, make a fancy bad ass cocktail, who makes a better looking tasting one.

activities.name: Bike tour
activities.desc: get bikes or rent some, skates, go in the least favorite direction and stay away from auto routes and big streets. Drive together and slowly. Stop for kisses
